NonDILI_Evidence.summary: No strong non-DILI evidence identified from available data. Viral serology data largely missing; sepsis ruled out; no alternative hepatic injury documented in the provided data.
notes: Missing hepatitis A/B/C/HeV/HHSV serologies limit exclusion of infectious etiologies.
Sepsis data not supported by clinical evidence (sepsis = false).
No ischemic liver injury data available (missing_ischemic_liver_injury_data = true).
No autoimmune hepatitis markers available (ANA/ASMA/IgG all null).
